rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: Large open space with a foyer designed for welcoming guests; includes built-in storage and a display area.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious living area that adheres to Vastu principles with south-east orientation; designed for communal activities and family gatherings.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Co-located near the kitchen to optimize workflow while ensuring privacy; layout is designed in compliance with Indian residential norms.

rooms.name: Private Gym
rooms.description: Dedicated space for physical fitness, equipped with modern gym fixtures and sound insulation; integrates into the Brutalist aesthetic.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Efficient kitchen design that promotes workflow; includes state-of-the-art appliances and a dedicated dining counter.

rooms.name: Mudroom/Utility Room
rooms.description: Space for storage of outdoor gear, footwear, and cleaning supplies; aligns with the farmhouse aesthetic.

rooms.name: Service Area (Washroom, Storage)
rooms.description: Dedicated space for utilities including water supply, storage of maintenance equipment; integrated seamlessly within the design.

openings.description: Large double door entry designed to welcome visitors while maintaining privacy; includes a vestibule.
Secondary access for utility services, emergency exit compliant with local building norms.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Largest bedroom featuring a private balcony and en-suite bathroom; designed in accordance with Vastu for optimal energy flow.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Spacious bedroom with ample storage and a private study area; designed to maximize privacy while ensuring natural light.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Additional bedroom optimized for family use with integrated storage and a small sitting area; follows traditional design elements.

rooms.name: Master Bathroom
rooms.description: Luxury en-suite bathroom for the master bedroom; includes modern fixtures and finishes in line with Brutalist aesthetics.

openings.description: Internal staircase connecting ground floor to first floor; designed for safety and minimal space usage.
Open access to the rooftop terrace from Bedroom 1 (Master Bedroom) and Living Area.
openings.location: Adjacent to Master Bedroom and Living Room.

rooms.name: Rooftop Terrace
rooms.description: Expansive open terrace for relaxation, dining al fresco, or social gatherings; designed to maximize views and ventilation.

openings.description: Staircase leading from first floor to rooftop terrace; designed in accordance with local building codes.
openings.location: Centrally located on the first floor.
